fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Summon** (3 uses): Choose a player during the day to summon them to your side. They will join the Brainless faction and receive a random Brainless role. This ability can be used on any player, including those who are dead or already part of another faction. The summoned player's original role will be replaced with their new Brainless role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesdays and Fridays, Munchkin gains the ability to summon an additional player each day and an extra use of **Summon**.
- Whenever a summoned player is lynched, Munchkin gains the ability to summon two players the following day and an extra use of **Summon**.
